ayath mama wage thanikada kenek wenna oone.ayath thaniyen mamath thaniyen dennama ekathu wunama dennatama thani na ehema hithapu nisada danne naha bahinna kiyanne.hama bankuwakama kuda yata denna denna inna darshanamayi thiyenne.karana hama deyakma mama deparak hondata hithana kenek nisa wena kollo wage eka sare langata gihin ha kiwuwe na.eka sarayak ba kiyapu magen aayeth lajja nathuwa athin katha karanawa.bahina holt eka dihata atha dik karala pennanne methanin bahinna kiyannak wage.dewani sareth mama sadde pita nowenna thol walin ba kiyana gaman oluwath wanuwa.
ammapa oya kiyanne sinhala baudhada sirilankawatama enna oone ballange passa paththata petral gahuwa wage upamawak ahanna.
